author: LeonCrimsonhart
body:
TIL that Donald Sutherland was a UofT alumnus. RIP.


**EDIT:** [Engineering AND drama](https://alumni.utoronto.ca/news/memoriam-donald-sutherland-canadian-acting-legend). What a chad.
